title: sEvittAl un janmam
sahitya:
sEvittAl un janmam sAphalyam urum manamE sEvark-koDiyOnuDaiya sEvaDiyai dinamumE


anupallavi

  tAvinikka avan tiru nAmattai OdinAl pAvam yAvum tIrap-pEru peralAmE


caraNam    vancaka mighunda vaiyaga vAzhvidanil cancalat-tApangaL minjina pOdellAm
tanjam enravanai nADi dayai puriya manrADi kenjik-kUttADi nenjam urugap-pADi
